content:
TASK RESULT 0-1: Project Scaffolding Complete

STATUS: Complete

DELIVERABLES CREATED:

1. Cargo Workspace (Cargo.toml)
   - Workspace resolver v2
   - Edition 2024
   - Workspace-level package metadata
   - Workspace dependencies for internal crates

2. Four Crates Created:
   - crates/notebook-core/ - Core types and crypto (no external deps)
   - crates/notebook-store/ - Storage layer (depends on notebook-core)
   - crates/notebook-entropy/ - Entropy calculations (depends on notebook-core)
   - crates/notebook-server/ - HTTP API (depends on notebook-core, notebook-store)

3. GitHub Actions CI (.github/workflows/ci.yml)
   - cargo build --all-targets --all-features
   - cargo test --all-targets --all-features
   - cargo clippy with -D warnings
   - cargo fmt check
   - Documentation check with warning deny
   - Cargo registry caching

4. Docker Compose (docker-compose.yml)
   - PostgreSQL 16 with Apache AGE (apache/age:PG16_latest)
   - Volume persistence
   - Health checks
   - Init script to enable AGE extension and create graph

5. Updated .gitignore
   - Rust artifacts (target/, Cargo.lock, *.rs.bk)
   - IDE files
   - Environment secrets
   - OS files

FILE PATHS:
- /Cargo.toml
- /crates/notebook-core/Cargo.toml
- /crates/notebook-core/src/lib.rs
- /crates/notebook-store/Cargo.toml
- /crates/notebook-store/src/lib.rs
- /crates/notebook-entropy/Cargo.toml
- /crates/notebook-entropy/src/lib.rs
- /crates/notebook-server/Cargo.toml
- /crates/notebook-server/src/lib.rs
- /.github/workflows/ci.yml
- /docker-compose.yml
- /migrations/init.sql
- /.gitignore (updated)

NOTES:
- Cargo not available in build environment; compilation verification deferred to CI
- Each lib.rs has placeholder comments indicating module ownership per coordination entry
- Workspace dependencies commented out for future agent use

BLOCKING STATUS: Other Phase 0 agents can now proceed with their tasks.
author: agent-scaffold
